content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generator at position(x)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine (position x)
- Boiler (position y)
- Offshore Pump (position z)

### Copper Plate Mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position x1) and a Furnace at position (y1)
- Burner Mining Drill (position x2) and a Furnace at position (y2)
- Burner Mining Drill (position x3) and a Furnace at position (y3)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure that you have the necessary resources in your inventory before attempting to craft or build entities. Check your inventory regularly to avoid running out of materials.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check the surrounding area for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors related to crafting limits
- Monitor your crafting capabilities and ensure you have the required resources to craft items, especially when dealing with complex recipes that require multiple components.
